jd: Hi , This is Srikanth from iTech US. I have below requirement with one of the premier Client. Please go through it and let me if you are interested to apply for same. Role: .Net Technical Lead with Azure Exp Location: Oakland, CA(Hybrid) - Local or Nearby states candidates Visa: Only H1B with PPnum Mandatory Job Description: Total IT Experience required Minimum 11 Years .net Core, Asp.net, Entity framework, Azure SQL Database, Azure Blob Storage, App Service, Azure Functions, Azure API Management Provide technical expertise, project oversight, communication, and collaboration within the assigned development team(s) and with stakeholders, guiding and ensuring projects meet specifications. Play a key role in architecting, designing, and building performant and scalable solutions using the Microsoft .NET Core stack and Azure platform Design and develop software applications on all levels (full stack) persistence, business logic and service layers, frontend, and APIs Write scalable, testable, high-quality code that meets requirements
